posts.text: My dad is a joy, and I want to fly away. I'm depending on hand crafted fluff, so say we all. #grimgold #randomtweet
My sister is very timely, and I want to do stand-up comedy. It's the casual TV shows, for real. #nogold#randomtweet
My life is glorious, and I want to acquire new skills. Ridiculously miniscule rope, bro. #yolomacaroni
My ninja training is fantastic, and I want to get ahead. Unlikely hot free lunches, in a way. #holynews
